issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

fields.description: Reading and/or writing from or to closed files should fail, but does not.  We probably are not checking `stream.good()` (or `stream.bad()`) in the underlying stream, or failing to check if the stream is closed.
fields.summary: [C++] GcsFileSystem *File classes fail to report errors
